text.title: part2_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes
text.p:
Jada :
— would be that same way .
Someone who would n’t be into it and be like , “ How could you even think something like that ?
That ’s gross , that ’s disgusting ! ”

hi.s: DS : So here you were thinking he hated you , but really he just had —

text.p:
Jada :
— this one little thing , this one little fetish that really is n’t a big deal .

hi.s: DS : Are you still with him ?
DS : Had you ever done explored BDSM before , or was it a new thing for you when he expressed it ?

p.s: We played a little bit , because I ’m just kind of kinky like that , but he never said anything .
So I did n’t know what was going on or what the problem was , until he finally told me he has a fetish .

From there we went to a film shop on
42nd Street
where all the porn can be found , and we found some fetish videos on bondage .
It just developed from there , and I started enjoying it more and more , and I wanted to know more about it on a psychological level than anything else .
So I started to become a dom .

I saw an ad on
Craig 's List
.

hi.s: DS : How long ago was that ?

text.p:
Jada :
About two years ago .
I decided if I am going to learn more about it I should learn from the pros ! [
Giggles
]

hi.s: DS : And how long have you been doing this , Alex ?
DS : How long do you see yourself doing this ?

p.s: I think I will always do it somewhat .
There ’s going to be an end .
For myself , I usually like to do things in blocks of a few years .

hi.s: DS : I ’m very much the same way .

text.p:
Alex :
Yeah !
So I could see…I ca n’t imagine it anytime soon because I ’m actually really happy with the way things are going right now , and I ca n’t imagine spending less time here .
But I imagine I will probably go down to just one day a week or I will be distracted by something else because I will be traveling or something .
So that ’s for me .
I do n’t know how much research you ’ve done on the sex industry…you ca n’t really compare it with the sex industry , in places where women…it ’s not like that ; there ’s really not an expiration , which is nice .
I think that might be a misconception .

Jada :
In that sense , older Doms are actually more respected .

Alex :
Yeah !
Some are more sought out , they have experience .
It ’s across the board ; people have different types and they want different things .
That ’s really nice .
It ’s not really an issue as it is …
